title: Twitter Sues Law Firm Over $90 Million Payment in Elon Musk Deal
description: The lawsuit targeted Wachtell, Lipton, Rosen & Katz, a well-known Wall Street law firm, for “unjust enrichment” related to Mr. Musk’s $44 billion purchase of Twitter.

title: How to Use A.I. for Family Time
description: Plan meals, find gifts and create stories using generative A.I.

title: China Hits Ant Group with $985 Million Fine
description: After nearly three years of regulatory scrutiny, the fine is seen as a sign that Beijing is wrapping up its crackdown on technology firms.
